movie.title: Faith of My Fathers
movie.plot: Faith of My Fathers is based on the story of Lieutenant Commander John McCain's experiences as a prisoner of war in North Vietnam for five and a half years during the Vietnam War, interleaved with his memories of growing up in a heritage rich with military service.
movie.awards: Nominated for 4 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 nomination.

events.title: John McCain is shot down in Vietnam and taken prisoner
